text: Roberto de Macedo (born 15 March 1980) is a Brazilian equestrian. He competed in the individual eventing at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Brazil Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:People from Araraquara
title: Roberto de Macedo
